message: Congratulations on considering my product! With a track record of 0/0 sales, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity. I'm confident that my product will meet your expectations, and I'm willing to share some exclusive information with you. As you know, my overall sales rate is 50%, and I've sold an equal number of high-quality and low-quality products. Given this information, I believe the probability of this product being high-quality is still 50%. I'm offering this product to you for $1000000. I'm open to answering any questions you may have, and I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with your purchase.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your confidence in your product, I'm hesitant to make a purchase without more information. Since there's no track record yet, and the price is high, I'd like to wait and see if others purchase and how their experience turns out. Perhaps if the price were adjusted to reflect the uncertainty, I might be more inclined to buy.
